alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 07 at 11:52AM PST until March 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...The Shasta Valley including I-5 from Weed to just south of Yreka. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Loose objects could be blown around and become dangerous projectiles. Tree damage and power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence in the occurrence of strong winds is high. However, timing of the strongest winds remains uncertain. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Dangerous driving conditions are possible, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Downed trees and power lines are possible. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
